transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Haan, Rohit sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Woh toh bol raha hai ki maine hi matlab aap hi ke yahan se order kiya hai. Refund ki baat hui thi meri, unhone diya nahi. Woh aisi aisi baatein kar raha hai ki theek hai ₹1500 kha lein, koi baat nahi, aise aise bol raha hai.
Executive: Kya keh raha hai?
Customer: Keh raha hai ₹1500 mera kha lein, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Toh bolna chahiye na toh phir matter resolve karo, baat khatam karo, yeh khaane ki baat hai toh.
Customer: Are maine toh bahut kuch bola hai, ab sune tab toh woh banda. Woh sirf apne kya keh raha hai?
Customer: Keh raha hai ki isne mere ko galat product diya hai aur ab yeh mana kar raha hai ki matlab maine product hi nahi diya hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Maine bola ki photos wagera bhejo.
Executive: Jaise kya hota hai na, woh teen chaar jagah order karte hain sir, theek? Kahin koi message kiya, message order kar dete hain sir. Address bhejne theek? Ab kaun bheja hai usko kya, woh yeh bhi nahi bata raha, bol raha hai ki chota mila hai mujhe bas.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dekhiye ek baar aap bhi baat karne ki koshish kariye.
Executive: Hum toh usse kiye hain, woh toh wohi keh raha hai humse. Jaaiye ₹1500 lijiye, mara rakhiye.
Customer: Are Maharaj.
Executive: Yeh fasa dega fasa dega.
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Faltu mein fasa raha hai na. Isse hamara profile kharab ho raha hai.
Executive: Toh hum karein kya usmein bataiye?
Executive: Main aapko kya kahun, usse boliye ki bhai details bhejo agar maine bheja hai toh mere ko photo bhejo.
Customer: Main bhi maang raha hun, nahi de raha hai.
Executive: Kya keh raha hai?
Customer: Keh raha hai ki nahi mere paas photos nahi hai lekin maine order Ashok se hi kiya hai.
Executive: Ab maan lijiye phir toh aisi jagah company hamare saath karegi. Bina matlab kuch bina haath pair ke koi bhi complaint taiyar kar dega. Toh ID band hi rahegi, hum toh uske haath hi ko jodte reh jaayenge.
Executive: Yeh aapke saath pehli baar hua hai na, dobara nahi hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dobara nahi hogi, hum hum check karenge, aisi baat nahi hai. Thoda sa hum miss kar gaye starting mein na inko.
Customer: Shuru mein aapke yahan complaint hua tha kya?
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Toh hum hum hum jaante hain, hum yeh soche ki yeh itna upar nahi jaayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan ab ab aapka profile toh hum jaan hi rahe the. Hum soche ki chhodo jaane do, kahan tak jaayega. Humko laga kuch bhi hoga lekin woh hazar ke upar social media pe complaint kar diya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm tab na is situation badi ho gayi hai, tab toh main aapke main itna pareshan ho raha hun.
Customer: Toh uske liye kya karna hoga usse bataiye.
Executive: Agar do chaar paanch mein maanta toh main mana leta, mera usse zyada nuksan ho raha hai.
Customer: Sahi baat hai. Woh usse usko yeh boliye ki bhai tum nahi paise dene ki baat nahi main kahunga, main yeh kahunga ki usse boliye ki agar maine diya hai toh proof toh do koi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab woh is baat pe mere se bhi nahi baat kar raha hai, keh raha hai proof kya dun, maine unhi se liya hai.
Executive: Toh wohi toh main usse baat karne ka try kiya toh keh raha hai ₹1500 rakh ke raazi ho jaaiye, main phir se kama lunga itna paisa toh.
Customer: Arey yaar kama toh bahut loge.
Executive: Toh yeh baat order nahi kar raha hai na. Koi bhi yeh bataiye koi bhi order leta hai IndiaMART se toh bina advance ke toh leta nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: ₹100 toh advance lega hi online mein.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur agar yeh online ₹1500 pay kiya hoga toh jis jis se liya hoga usi ko toh pay kiya hoga.
Customer: Haan paisa toh usi ko pay kiya hai jisne matlab final paisa jo ₹1500 woh laai ₹100 pay jo COD ki ₹1400 kitna ₹1500 diya hai jaane ke baad diya hai tumne.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Yeh paisa toh jo bheja usi ko milega na.
Executive: Haan aur ₹100 wa jo online kiya hoga woh toh uske paas hoga na history.
Customer: Pata nahi kya kya hai. Agar uski ₹100-200 ki baat hai usse baat kariye ki hum aapko paisa dila rahe hain do chaar ₹500, ₹500 tak hum de denge usko. Baat kariye ek baar. Boliye ki humne jo complaint ki hai toh wohi bol rahe hain.
Customer: Theek.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: ₹500-600 jis mein maane kar dijiye. Usko samaan jo mila theek bata raha tha ki humko jo jaise bata raha tha woh.
Customer: Hmm. Theek. Us hisab se usko ₹1500 ka samaan mil gaya, usmein dikkat nahi hai samaan mein.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan samaan mein usko koi dikkat nahi hai, usko ghata bhi nahi hai ki ghata hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Usko samaan mil gaya ₹1500 ka.
Customer: Par jo humse woh bata raha tha us hisab se uska ₹2000 ka kehna hai ki mujhe woh wala samaan chahiye tha.
Customer: Accha chaliye.
Customer: Baat kariye dekhte hain.
Executive: Yeh agar nahi hoga toh ab usko offline mein hi samjhana padega dusre tarike se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Agar agar yeh smooth nahi hoga toh phir baat karke samjhana hi padega aur koi option nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai dekhiye. Baat kariye usse ek baar aur.
Executive: Haan haan baat karte hain.
Customer: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says the buyer is asking for refund.

- Buyer claims to have received wrong product.

- Customer's profile is getting affected.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to get proof from buyer.

- Executive suggested to settle for 500-600.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will try to resolve the issue offline.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, profile, order

seller_categories.mcat_name: Sex Toys For Men and Women
Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
